full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: Installation of Sod, RCMP Depot Division, Regina, Saskatchewan**
**Solicitation Number: M5000-23-4285/A**
**Publication Date: April 29, 2023**
**Tender Closing Date:** May 18, 2023 at 15:00:00

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) Depot Division in Regina, Saskatchewan requires landscape services to install sod on the sports field track, correct ponding issues, and adjust sprinkler heads to ensure proper operation and coverage. The contract period is from issuance to completion of work, with an estimated duration of six weeks.

**Security Requirements:** The solicitation contains security requirements, and a site visit will be offered to interested bidders. The evaluation team will select a bidder based on their compliance with the conditionally set-aside Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB). To be considered, the bidder must certify that they qualify as an Indigenous business and comply with all requirements of PSIB.

The federal government's IBD is an online resource that can help Indigenous businesses identify opportunities and increase their visibility. Bidders are encouraged to register in the IBD to take advantage of this resource.

**Evaluation Criteria:** Bids will be evaluated based on their responsiveness, compliance with the PSIB, and the lowest evaluated price.

**Submission Requirements:** Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit as per page one of the Request for Proposal (RFP). Documents can be downloaded from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) at https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.

The RCMP is committed to providing a safe and secure environment. The contracting authority retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement and reserves the right to make amendments to the solicitation.

To obtain the full Request for Proposal (RFP) document, please visit the link below:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5110/202304285---rfp-m5000-23-4285--en_0.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5110/202304285---rfp---m5000-23-4285---a---fr.pdf
